name: Crab Hammer
description:
In this 8-bit style adventure platformer game you're playing as a crab avenging pity cooks with a big wooden hammer(mallet).

Controls: cursor keys for walking left/right; Space - jump; Z, X or C - hit with a hammer (when you have it). Follow the prompts at the top of the screen You start every level without the hammer. You have to find it on the level, avoiding cooks that are trying to catch you. When you find the hammer - hammer the cooks out! The minimum amount of cooks is shown in the prompt area, every cook hammered above this level brings you twice more points. If you are unable to complete the level task and no cooks left - just dive into the water, it restarts the level without losing a life.

Based on the beautiful assets by GrafxKid - https://grafxkid.itch.io/

Music by Xbost.

Try the free web-version first(with ads): https://yandex.com/games/play/175612/
